branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1H-A*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/ Stroke Adjuster - Linear Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>Rodless Cylinders, MY1H-A*Z and MY1H-S*Z include a high precision guide that improves positioning accuracy.  They have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile.</p>

breadCrumb.name: Rodless Cylinder - Mechanically Jointed - Linear Guide
Rodless Cylinder, MY1H-A*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/ Stroke Adjuster - Linear Guide

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1H-A*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/ Stroke Adjuster - Linear Guide
branchItem.description: <p>The MY1H-A*Z Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. The integrated linear guide improves positioning accuracy. Air cushions are standard adjustable with an easy access cushion needle, and external shock absorbers are optional. Auto-switch mounting has been enhanced with a face mounting feature.</p>

branchItem.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1H-S*Z, Mechanically Jointed w/o Stroke Adjuster - Linear Guide
branchItem.description: <p>The MY1H-S*Z Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure with an enhanced magnetic dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders and features a low profile. The integrated linear guide improves positioning accuracy. Air cushions are standard adjustable with an easy access cushion needle. Auto-switch mounting has been enhanced with a face mounting feature.</p>
